description: BGG MCP provides access to BoardGameGeek and a variety of board game related data through the Model Context Protocol. Enabling retrieval and filtering of board game data, user collections, and profiles.

BGG_COOKIE.description: Cookie string for BGG authentication. Only needed if not using API key

BGG_API_KEY.description: API key from BoardGameGeek for authentication. Get one at https://boardgamegeek.com/applications

BGG_USERNAME.description: Your BGG username for personalized features

capabilities.name: bgg-collection
capabilities.description: Find the details about a specific users board game collection on BoardGameGeek (BGG)

capabilities.name: bgg-details
capabilities.description: Find the details about a specific board game on BoardGameGeek (BGG)

capabilities.name: bgg-hot
capabilities.description: Find the current board game hotness on BoardGameGeek (BGG)

capabilities.name: bgg-price
capabilities.description: Get current prices for board games from multiple retailers using BGG IDs

capabilities.name: bgg-recommender
capabilities.description: Get game recommendations based on a specific game using either the BoardGameGeek (BGG) ID or name directly. ID is preferred for faster responses.

capabilities.name: bgg-rules
capabilities.description: Use this tool when users ask rules questions about board games (e.g., 'How does X work?', 'Can I do Y?', 'What happens when Z?'). Searches BoardGameGeek rules forums to find answers and clarifications from the community.

capabilities.name: bgg-search
capabilities.description: Search for board games on BoardGameGeek (BGG) by name or part of a name using a broad search (e.g., 'Catan', 'Ticket to Ride')

capabilities.name: bgg-thread-details
capabilities.description: Get full content of a specific BoardGameGeek forum thread, including all posts and replies. Use this after finding relevant threads with bgg-rules.

capabilities.name: bgg-trade-finder
capabilities.description: Find what games user1 owns that user2 has on their wishlist. Shows potential trading opportunities.

capabilities.name: bgg-user
capabilities.description: Find details about a specific user on BoardGameGeek (BGG)
